title: Elegant Caligraphy - Mardian-esque? Any ideas?
content:
I can't seem to find the script font? The closest thing I could find was Mardian below. The bottom font to my surprise was Nevis not Gotham. Anywho...any help would be appreciated! Thanks in advance!

[http://www.aringtypeface.com/mardian/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317120800/http:/www.aringtypeface.com/mardian/ "http://www.aringtypeface.com/mardian/")

Font: 

 Piel Script 

Solved By: 

 [fvilanakis](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317120800/http:/typophile.com/user/176276 "View user profile.")

comments.content: I think it's **[Piel Script](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317120800/http:/typophile.com/wiki/https%3A/%252Fwww.myfonts.com/fonts/sudtipos/piel-script/)** by Alejandro Paul [Sudtipos, 2010]
